verbose_text: Drug resistance of metastatic breast cancer has been attributed to the change in receptor status, altered expression of MRP1, BCRP, and adenosine triphosphate binding cassette (ABC) superfamily of transporters, PTEN and Bcl-2, and loss of DNA repair mechanisms XREF_BIBR.
evidence: expression of MRP1, BCRP, and adenosine triphosphate
